name: The Perfect Game (BlackDragonBE)
description:
A small game made in 3 days for the 'So Bad it's Good' Jam 2020.

Smash your way through animals popping their heads up the holes. Can you be the hammer master we need?

Controls:

  • Click: Smash
  • Space: Smash again
  • Escape: Stop smashing

Features:

  • Lots of unique intricately made animals. *
  • Spectacular graphics and effects.
  • State of the art animations.
  • Soothing music composes by the greatest of artists.
  • Online multiplayer action.****
  • The Dark Souls of hammer smashing.
  • Long lists make it seem like there's a lot going on in the game.
  • Seriously, this list doesn't mean anything. Just play the game, it takes like 5 minutes tops.
  • Why are you still reading this? Play the game already.
  • Dude, I have nothing more to tell you.
  • Who reads this anyway?

* No animals were harmed during the making of this game.
** No humans were hurt either.
*** Well, maybe one, just me while creating this mess. Only emotionally though.
**** Not really. What? Did you read the "made in 3 days" part? I'm not a wizard.
